backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the Daily Grind app defining types and persistent state for workout schedules, motivational messages, user profiles, and a 22-tier progression system, with access control via authorization mixins and seeded motivational messages on initialization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two notification-related features (browser Web Push notification scheduling and a Settings toggle for opt-in/opt-out) to their implementing frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short summaries of each frontend source file, describing the purpose and key details of components, pages, hooks, utilities, and public assets in the React frontend.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom property tokens for light and dark themes, covering background, foreground, primary, chart, and sidebar color variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Daily Grind PWA, linking the web manifest, setting PWA meta tags for iOS and theme color, and mounting the React app via the root div and main.tsx module script.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA web app manifest for Daily Grind specifying standalone display mode, dark background and orange theme colors, and a single 256x256 maskable app icon.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service Worker that schedules repeating 6-hour workout reminder notifications using setInterval, displays random motivational quotes, handles START/STOP/TEST messages from the main app, and focuses or opens the app window on notification click.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router app defining five routes (index, today, schedule, progress, settings) wrapped in a RootLayout component that registers the service worker on mount and provides ThemeProvider and AppLayout.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Defines the main application shell with a sticky header, desktop nav bar, and mobile bottom nav, showing navigation links only when the user is authenticated.
frontend/src/components/AuthGuard.tsx: Wraps protected routes to show a loading spinner, login screen, or profile setup modal depending on authentication and profile fetch state.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Renders a login/logout button that triggers Internet Identity authentication and clears the React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Displays a centered landing/login page with app branding, feature highlights, and the LoginButton for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that collects a display name and notification preference from new users and saves the profile via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/TierBadge.tsx: Defines 22 ranked tiers with associated styles and exports a TierBadge component that renders a styled badge in compact or full variants.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider context and useInternetIdentity hook that manage AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout flow, and identity state for ICP Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Custom React hook that manages browser push notification state, syncing enabled/disabled status with the backend user profile and exposing enable, disable, and test notification actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for the app, covering workout schedules CRUD, motivational messages, user profile, and tier system queries and mutations against the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, sets up Tailwind, and defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark fitness-themed color schemes along with utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/Progress.tsx: Progress page that displays weekly workout stats, current streak, a day-by-day completion grid, and the user's tier badge, derived from workout schedule data.
frontend/src/pages/Schedule.tsx: Schedule page that renders a per-day workout card list allowing users to create, edit, delete, and expand workout entries for each day of the week.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Settings page that exposes tier progression evaluation controls and a push notification toggle, displaying current tier info and workout completion progress.
frontend/src/pages/TodaysWorkout.tsx: React page that displays the current day's workout from the user's schedule, shows a motivational message banner, and provides a toggle button to mark the workout as completed.
frontend/src/utils/notificationService.t: Utility module for managing browser push notifications via a service worker, including registration, permission requests, and sending start/stop/test messages to the SW.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with helpers for persisting and clearing values via sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a custom design system with OKLCH-based color tokens, extended typography/shadow/border-radius values, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state manifest describing the 'Daily Grind' workout reminder app's architecture, existing features, known issues, and versioning metadata.
